short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide your profit, revenue and cost tabs on all pages on Current RMS with the click of a button. Unhide by clicking the button again

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the icon to hide revenue, profit and cost across your browser session. This is perfect when working on an opportunity or project in front of a client or supplier and don't want them to easily see this information
